text: hello this is Bill Cunningham and this
week we're focusing in on menswear it
yes it does coincide with the European
men's designer collections that was
shown in the last two weeks for next
winter but this is right now in New York
and the really the important news I
thought this year of the year is on the
top of the body in particular the hats
the post-world War fedora hats
everywhere the young men mostly young
have kind of rediscovered the attitude
or whatever you want of the hats it's
hilarious to see it happen the one man
came by and he was taking a selfie
photograph of himself in his new hat
it was wonderful you know because
fashion does that to people and that's
what fashion is all about feeling good
looking good the other news at the top
of the body are the haircuts
now there the head is shaved all around
with some people call a mohawk
but it's developed from the mohawk cut
into something else
often the hair on top is longer and it's
combed over one side the other thing
that I noticed that was very very
interesting is the luck seing up or
reaching up if you will of jackets and
coats with fur collars or touches of fur
that was interesting and as a matter of
fact at this time in the ready-to-wear
clothing industry menswear is
leading way ahead of women the interest
with young men a whole new generation
then don't feel the constraints by
wearing something a little offbeat and
it's marvelous to see
